short_summary: Maintenance and Repair HVAC Equipment for the Department of National Defence located at 9 Wing Gander, Gander, NL.
description: This project involves the provision of all labour, materials, and equipment for the maintenance and servicing and inspection of commercial and industrial refrigeration, heat pumps, electronic control systems, and air compressors for the Department of National Defence located at 9 Wing Gander, Gander, NL. Contract term: 2 years, with an option to extend for 1 year. Estimated value: $100,001 - $500,000. Trade agreements: WTO GPA, CPTPP, CFTA, CETA, FTAs with Peru, Colombia, Panama, Korea, UK. Notice type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
tags: Public Works and Government Services Canada
